headline: Carolyn Weinberg Joins BNY as Chief Solutions Innovation Officer
summary: The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation ("BNY") (NYSE: BK), a global financial services company, today announced the appointment of Carolyn Weinberg as its Chief Solutions Innovation Officer.
